donation_faqs.question: How can I make a donation?
donation_faqs.answer: We accept donations online via credit/debit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers. You can also donate in person or by mail.

donation_faqs.question: Is my donation tax-deductible?
donation_faqs.answer: Yes, donations to our organization are tax-deductible. We will provide a receipt for your contribution.

donation_faqs.question: Can I make a recurring donation?
donation_faqs.answer: Absolutely! You can set up monthly, quarterly, or yearly recurring donations through our secure donation portal.

donation_faqs.question: Where does my donation go?
donation_faqs.answer: Your donation directly supports our programs and initiatives, including [specific projects], and helps us cover operational costs to serve more people.

donation_faqs.question: Can I donate in someone’s name?
donation_faqs.answer: Yes, you can make a donation in honor or memory of someone, and we will send a personalized acknowledgment to the recipient if you wish.

donation_faqs.question: Are my payment details secure?
donation_faqs.answer: Yes, all transactions are encrypted and processed through trusted, secure payment gateways.

donation_faqs.question: Can I volunteer instead of donating money?
donation_faqs.answer: Definitely! We welcome volunteers. Please visit our “Volunteer” page to see current opportunities.

donation_faqs.question: Can I donate goods or services instead of money?
donation_faqs.answer: Yes, we accept certain goods and professional services. Please contact us to see what donations are currently needed.

donation_faqs.question: How can I track the impact of my donation?
donation_faqs.answer: We provide updates through newsletters, annual reports, and our website, showing how donations are used and the outcomes achieved.

donation_faqs.question: Can I cancel or change my recurring donation?
donation_faqs.answer: Yes, you can manage your recurring donations anytime by logging into your account or contacting our support team.
